title: How to use grammar in poetry - Quora

response.answer_text: Use correct grammar and spelling at all times, please, unless your poem is written in a dialect. Punctuation is another thing. Use it, or don’t use it, as your muse dictates. Line breaks can serve as commas and periods (full stops). I personally find (as a reader of poetry) that seeing the first letter of each line capitalized is distracting. I’d recommend you don’t do it. But at the end of the day (or at 5 am, haha) it’s your poem, and you can write it as you please.
